title: Trump touts 'political earthquake' in speech to House Republicans
shortDescription: The speech kicks off Republicans' House issues conference held at Trump's property in Miami.

title: White House releases Melania Trump's official portrait
shortDescription: First Lady Melania Trump released an official portrait Monday, a week after her husband Donald Trump was sworn as the 47th President.

title: Senate confirms Bessent as Treasury secretary
shortDescription: Bessent, 62, is a longtime hedge fund manager, Trump donor and adviser. He'll be the point person for Trump on a host of key economic issues.

title: Indiana deputy fatally shoots Jan. 6 rioter pardoned by President Trump
shortDescription: Matthew Huttle was among more than 1,500 people pardoned by President Donald Trump stemming from the Capitol attack Jan. 6, 2021.

title: Trump calls on Voight, Stallone and Gibson to be 'Special Ambassadors' to Hollywood
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has appointed Jon Voight, Sylvester Stallone, and Mel Gibson as his “eyes and ears” in Hollywood.

title: California wildfires: Trump issues wide-reaching water order
shortDescription: Donald Trump signed a wide-ranging executive order demanding federal and state officials deliver more water and other resources to southern California.

title: Justice Department fires officials who investigated Trump
shortDescription: The acting attorney general fired more than a dozen officials who assisted special counsel Jack Smith's prosecutions against President Donald Trump.

title: 'Degenerate material': Oklahoma senator introduces bill to ban porn
shortDescription: Those found guilty of producing, distributing or possessing pornography would face criminal penalties of up to 10 years in prison if SB593 passes.

title: Trump holds off on Colombia tariffs after agreement on deportation
shortDescription: Plus: Trump floats a plan to move Palestinians to Egypt and Jordan. | Are we facing a home insurance crisis? | These and more stories on The Excerpt.

title: President Trump's radical immigration agenda takes shape | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Trump sought to make good on his campaign promises, signing a flurry of executive orders related to illegal immigration and refugee admissions.

title: What does FEMA do? What to know about agency Trump wants to overhaul
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Friday floated the idea of abolishing the Federal Emergency Management Agency. Here's what to know.

title: Donald Trump's historic first week in office
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has used his presidential power in record speed since taking office.

title: Pete Hegseth pledges to support President Trump
shortDescription: Secretary Pete Hegseth said the Defense Department will support "mass deportations in support of the president's objective."

title: Trump to ban DEI in military, reinstate troops who refused COVID shots
shortDescription: Trump's executive orders for the Pentagon will fulfill campaign promises that the Republican reiterated during last week's inaugural address.

title: President Trump backs off tariffs for Colombia
shortDescription: Colombia said they would accept deportation flights carrying Colombian migrants after the Trump administration threatened to impose tariffs.

title: Trump talks to House Republicans about TikTok, citizenship: Live updates
shortDescription: Donald Trump is huddling with House Republicans at a GOP retreat on Monday. Keep up with live updates from the USA TODAY Network.

title: Trump resumes threat to denaturalize US citizens
shortDescription: Trump ordered his administration to devote resources to investigating naturalized US citizens

title: Trump holds off on Colombia tariffs after deal reached on deportations
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is holding off on imposing tariffs and sanctions on Colombia following an agreement on accepting deportation flights.

title: GOP lawmaker says Trump made 'a mistake' by pardoning some Jan. 6 defendants
shortDescription: Sen. Lindsey Graham said in an interview that he thinks it was a “mistake” for Trump to pardon those who committed violent acts on Jan. 6, 2021.

title: Trumps slaps Colombia with trade, travel restrictions
shortDescription: Mexico, Colombia and Brazil push back on Trump's deportation of migrants. He promises 25% tariffs, travel ban on Colombia.

title: Republican senators urge Trump to rethink stripping security from ex-officials
shortDescription: Two senior Republican senators urged President Donald Trump to rethink his decision to strip personal security from some former Trump administration officials, one of whom was the target of an alleged Iranian plot.

title: USA TODAY reporters offer inside look at Donald Trump's second inauguration
shortDescription: USA TODAY reporters covered the historic events. They were inside the Capitol, walking the streets, at the White House and immersed in the MAGA crowd.

title: Vance knocks Catholic organization for criticizing Trump immigration policy
shortDescription: JD Vance knocked the U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops after the group criticized some of Donald Trump's immigration policies.
